cards.title: Greyhat
body: Dial Up
powers: Search your deck for a Link card and put it in hand. Shuffle your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

cards.title: Coerced Uplink
body: Play this card next to a non-Hero target.
When this card enters play, {Greyhat} deals that target 1 Lightning Damage.

cards.title: Digital Uplink
body: Play this card next to a Hero other than {Greyhat}.
When this card enters play, that Hero may use a power.

cards.title: Deployed Relay
body: At the end of your turn, you may search your Trash for a Link and put it into play.

cards.title: Instant Firewall
body: At the end of your turn, {Greyhat} deals each non-Hero target 1 Fire Damage.

cards.title: Proxy Pod
body: At the end of your turn, this card regains 2 HP.

cards.title: Direct Control
body: {Greyhat} and each other Hero next to a Link in their play area uses a power.
Each non-Hero Target next to a Link deals themselves 2 Energy Damage.

cards.title: Shock Therapy
body: {Greyhat} and each other Hero next to a Link regains 2 HP.
{Greyhat} deals each non-Hero Target next to a Link deals 3 Lightning Damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You may feel a slight tingle.

cards.title: Data Transfer
body: Draw a card.
Each other Player draws a card for each of their Heroes next to a link.
Draw a card for each non-Hero Target next to a Link.

cards.title: DDoS
body: {Greyhat} and each other Hero next to a link deals each non-Hero Target next to a Link 1 Energy Damage.

cards.title: System Reboot
body: Search your deck or trash for a Link and put it in your hand.
Put any number of Links in play back in your hand.
You may play a number of Link cards equal to the number of Links returned to your hand by this card.

cards.title: Bandwidth Restriction
body: When this card enters play, you may play a Link.
Reduce damage dealt to {Greyhat} and other Heroes next to a Link or by non-Hero Targets next to a Link by 1.

cards.title: Overclock Systems
body: When this card enters play, you may play a Link.
Increase damage dealt by {Greyhat} and other Heroes next to a Link or to non-Hero Targets next to a Link by 1.

cards.title: Auto-Redirect
body: When this card enters play, you may play a Link.
The first time each turn {Greyhat} or another Hero next to a Link would be dealt 3 or fewer damage, you may redirect that damage to a non-Hero target next to a link.

promoCards.title: Greyhat
body: Burst Noise
powers: {Greyhat} deals 1 Target 1 Sonic Damage. 1 Target next to a Link deals that Target 1 Sonic Damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

openingLines.default: Too much noise in the signal - time to clean it up.
